About the Company: Anjani Dham Industries is engaged in the manufacture of textiles, fabricated and home textiles for international market. Flannel and seer suckers are available in various prints, including conceptual designs, tie dye, floral patterns, cartoons and various other forms of designs. Their range of manufacturing capabilities includes printing, finishing and additional machinery, such as mercerizer, jet, singeing, calendar, peach and raising. The Company manufactures European-designed bed sheets, ethnic and western dress materials, and formal and casual shirt materials.
